mapper.insert: insert into system(store_id, push_money_rate, start_bill, retail_warehouse_id, retail_bank_account_id) values (#{storeId}, 6, 0, null, null);
mapper.delete: delete from system where store_id = #{storeId} and store_id > 0;
mapper.select: select push_money_rate from system where store_id = 0;
mapper.update: update system set push_money_rate = #{pushMoneyRate} where store_id = 0 and #{pushMoneyRate} >= 0;
mapper.select: select store_id, start_bill from system where store_id = #{storeId} and store_id > 0;
mapper.update: update system set start_bill = 1 where store_id = #{storeId} and store_id > 0 and start_bill = 0;
update system set retail_warehouse_id = #{retailWarehouseId}, retail_bank_account_id = #{retailBankAccountId} where store_id = #{storeId} and store_id > 0;
